resources.string:
Abacus child learning application!
Abacus will help your children learn about Abacus, Numbers, Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division.

Download Abacus App from Google Play Store 👇👇👇😍😇
If you want any customization on material like change to Logo, add watermark, etc.. you can contact us on %1$s

Here we declare the Privacy Policy for Abacus - Child Learning Application android mobile application.

Abacus - Child Learning Application is a mathematical tools used for calculation. This app will help your children learn about Abacus, Numbers, Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division.

Abacus is suitable for children age 5 and up, who know about numbers and some basic addition and subtraction.

All application data collocting by Brainapptech Team and we are responsible for that if any issue regarding to data. Content not have any violent, sexual or nudity and drugs so all the people can use it and special kids below 9 year.

Benefits of Abacus - Child Learning Application : 
- Boosting the calculation skills making them better and faster.
- Sharpens concentration and comprehension.
- Increases endurance for stress and pressure.
- It helps in better reading and writing.
- Sharpens listening skills.
- One of major benefits of Abacus program is that it makes mathematics meaningful, useful and fun for the children.
- Specially this Abacus program is very effective for those who do not like studying math.

Give exam as per your children level and determine result.
Download practice material available, its not only math your kids can learn all about around us.
- Kids can learn about Pets animals, Farm animals, Mammal animals, Sea animals, Wild animals, Birds, Fruits, Vegetables, Shapes, etc..
- Count the objects, Fill the blank, Less than & Greater than & Equals, Odds & Evens number.
- Know about Abacus, Identify beads of abacus, Draw beads of abacus.
- Learn about Number, Addition & Subtraction, Multiplication & Division.

Application contain ads but its not harmfull to child. We contolled ads to showing in application. We blocked all the Sensitive Categories ads which can harmfull to kids.

We are responsible for all content which are showing in application and we declare in Privacy Policy.

In application following permission is used.
1) INTERNET - For data load and ads loading.

Best Regarding,
Brainapptech Team.

Limited Abacus Usage: Explore and solve up to 20 abacus problems on each page. Practice your mental arithmetic skills with a variety of challenges!
Abacus Hint Enabled: Utilize the Abacus Hint feature to receive helpful hints and tips while solving abacus problems.
Exercise, Exam, and Custom Challenge Modules:< /font> Attempt each module once a week to reinforce your abacus skills and track your progress over time.
Advertisements: Please note, advertisements may appear periodically to support our efforts in providing you with this educational platform.
Unlimited Practice of Abacus: Access an unlimited number of abacus practice sessions to sharpen your skills.
Abacus Hint + Hint Sound: Receive helpful hints along with audio cues while practicing abacus, enhancing your learning experience.
Nursery and Maths Printable Practice Material: Unlock printable practice materials for nursery and math exercises, allowing for offline learning.
Do Practice with Your Physical Abacus Tools: Seamlessly integrate your physical abacus tools with the app for hands-on practice.
Unlimited Practice with Exercise, Exam, and Custom Challenge Mode Module: Enjoy unrestricted access to practice sessions, exams, and custom challenges for comprehensive learning.
See the Report History Card of Exercise, Exam, and Custom Challenge Mode Module: Track and analyze your performance with detailed report cards for exercises, exams, and custom challenges.
Multiple Abacus Themes: Customize your learning environment with a variety of abacus themes to suit your preferences.
Random Number in Abacus Free Mode: Challenge yourself with random number scenarios in the abacus free mode for a dynamic learning experience.
Reset Page Progress and Start Again: Have the flexibility to reset page progress and restart exercises as needed.
No Advertisement: Enjoy an uninterrupted learning experience without any distracting advertisements.

Important Notes : We upgrade our system, so if you didn\'t register with us in new system, then please create your account 1st. And also you can access your old purchase after register or login.

Thank you.
Everything for child to learn & grow there brain
Design and Development by Brain Apptech Team

• A4 size and printable material

• Learn about Count the objects, Fill the blank, Less than & Greater than & Equals, Odds & Evens number.

• Know about Abacus, Identify beads of abacus, Draw beads of abacus.

• Learn about Number, Addition & Subtraction, Multiplication & Division and much more..

• Once paid you can download any time.

• A4 size and printable material

• Connect the Dots of Standing lines, Sleeping lines, Slanting lines, Arc, Circle, Zigzag lines & Shapes

• Connect the Dots for Capital and small later of ABCD, 1 to 10 Number with Multiple visual images.

• Once paid you can download any time.

Select Abacus theme base on kid\'s favourite color
Use your Left Hand to move beads
Use your Right Hand to move beads
Click here to Watch Video Tutorial\nto learn how make calculation with Abacus
Take different type of Exam to\ncheck your Kid\'s Ability
Select different type of\nExercise to improve your\nKid\'s Performance
Help your child to keep\nACTIVE always
always use your index finger\nto move top bead to downward.
always use your thumb\nto move bottom beads to upward.
always use your index finger\nto move bottom beads to downward.
always use your thumb\nto move top bead to upward.
each lower bead value is 1\nand the upper bead value is 5
each lower bead value is 10\nand the upper bead value is 50
each lower bead value is 100\nand the upper bead value is 500,\nso on..

Unlock unlimited weekly exams with our premium subscription!\n🚀 Subscribe now for limitless learning opportunities. 📚✨
🚀Subscribe for Unlimited Math Exercises!\nElevate your skills with endless practice opportunities. 🧮✨
🚀Upgrade for Unlimited Custom Challenges!\nSubscribe now to access the Custom Challenge Mode anytime, anywhere. 🎮✨
What is the Abacus Child Learning Application?
The Abacus Child Learning Application is an educational app designed to help children learn math skills through interactive abacus exercises and activities.
Do I need to subscribe to use the app?
While the app offers some free content, a subscription plan provides access to premium features and a more comprehensive learning experience.
How do I subscribe to the premium plan?

To subscribe to the premium plan, go to the "Subscription" section in the app, choose your preferred plan, and follow the on-screen instructions. Payments are processed securely through our integrated payment gateway.
What payment methods are accepted for the subscription?

We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and other secure payment options available through our payment gateway. Check support and not support payment methods : https://support.google.com/googleplay/topic/3365267
Why is my payment method not supported for subscription?

Certain payment methods may not be supported due to limitations imposed by the payment processing system. We recommend using one of the supported methods available in the app. Check support and not support payment methods : https://support.google.com/googleplay/topic/3365267
Can I contact support to inquire about alternative payment methods?
Absolutely. If you encounter issues with payment methods, feel free to contact our customer support team at %1$s. They can provide guidance and explore potential solutions.
Yes, we prioritize the security of your payment information. Our payment gateway employs industry-standard encryption to ensure a secure and safe transaction process.
Are there advertisements in the app?
Yes, there are advertisements in the app, but they are designed to be child-friendly and age-appropriate. Subscribers to the premium plan enjoy an ad-free experience.
How do I log in to my account?
On "Login" page, enter your credentials (username and password), and click "Submit." If you encounter any issues, you can reset your password or contact our support team for assistance.
Subscribers enjoy benefits such as unlimited access to premium content, an ad-free experience, personalized learning features, and more interactive exercises.
Can I cancel my subscription at any time?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Simply go to the "https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions" and "Cancel Subscription." Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing cycle.
Is there a workaround if my payment method is not supported?

Unfortunately, if your payment method is not supported, we recommend using one of the available alternatives. Our support team can assist you in exploring options and addressing any concerns you may have.
If you have any further questions or concerns, please reach out to our customer support team at %1$s.
